cited_protocols.title: Hairy root generation in common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris L.) and selection of Agrobacterium rhizogenes clones

creator.name: Ronal Pacheco
creator.affiliation: Biotechnology Institute, National Autonomous University of Mexico

creator.name: Ronal Pacheco
creator.affiliation: Biotechnology Institute, National Autonomous University of Mexico

affiliations.affiliation: Biotechnology Institute, National Autonomous University of Mexico

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"82pp7","text":"The common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris L.) is one of the legumes used to study the molecular mechanisms that regulate mycorrhizal and rhizobial symbioses. To study these mechanisms, the generation of transgenic hairy roots is a very advantageous method for applying genetic approaches. However, the generation of hairy roots is a difficult task that requires a lot of skill and experience. Here we show an optimized protocol for the generation of hairy roots in common bean.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":17,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kbem","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"76hlo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"align":"","authors":"Estrada-Navarrete G, Alvarado-Affantranger X, Olivares JE, Guillén G, Díaz-Camino C, Campos F, Quinto C, Gresshoff PM, Sanchez F","can_edit":true,"date":1167609600,"doi":"https://doi.org/","guid":"F2B26270D7B611EDB14F7561B6A1D141","id":0,"journal":"","protocol_id":0,"title":"Fast, efficient and reproducible genetic transformation of Phaseolus spp. by Agrobacterium rhizogenes."}}}}

references.title: Fast, efficient and reproducible genetic transformation of Phaseolus spp. by Agrobacterium rhizogenes.
references.authors: Estrada-Navarrete G, Alvarado-Affantranger X, Olivares JE, Guillén G, Díaz-Camino C, Campos F, Quinto C, Gresshoff PM, Sanchez F

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fp9pd","text":"Immerse the common bean seeds in   ethanol for    and wash them three times with sterile water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4h1mc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"96","error_concentration":false,"guid":"9D9B2820DCC611ED90AEAB7E43F8F8F9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"B1C7A580DCC611ED90AEAB7E43F8F8F9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfb7o","text":"Immerse the seeds in    sodium hypochlorite for   and wash them three times with sterile water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"26tmf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cad9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26dqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7isc4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C0A86490DCC611ED90AEAB7E43F8F8F9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"DD33D3B0DCC611ED90AEAB7E43F8F8F9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"70a0k","text":"The concentration of sodium hypochlorite may be higher than indicated, but this depends on the quality of the seeds. When the quality of the seed is not very good, a higher concentration of sodium hypochlorite can damage a large number of them, rendering them useless for germination. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8km04","text":"Keep the seeds at   in a disinfected container, e.g., sterile  , or reused Petri dishes previously sterilized with   ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rqh3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"886d2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fifup","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ah8k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F128ED60DCC611ED90AEAB7E43F8F8F9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":959282,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Plastic Petri dishes (100x15 mm)","linfor":"","url":"http://","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"0A09E720DD4011EDB96CFB1BB087B26A","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"96","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FC187510DCC611ED90AEAB7E43F8F8F9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}}}}

steps.section: Seedling transformation by A. rhizogenes K599 (3rd day)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f86i","text":"Apply the inoculum of A. rhizogeneson the wounded zone, taken directly from the plates, using an autoclaved micropipette tip ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":22,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6c6bi","text":"Place the infected seedlings on the top of plastic tubes, i.e.,   containing B \u0026 D medium. https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/1-4020-3735-X ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":91,"length":52},{"key":2,"offset":143,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":9026,"mol_weight":0,"name":"15 mL Falcon tubes","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"EF27BED0DCC911ED80A21D6E1BD99D9D","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EDA1DF5BDD5511ED8E850A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/1-4020-3735-X"}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C17D680DD5511EDB96CFB1BB087B26A","height":308,"id":367784,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Components of B\u0026D medium.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfkbwhff.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfibwhff.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfjbwhff.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfhbwhff.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7b4f","text":"Place the plastic tubes inside glass tubes   containing autoclaved deionized water and cover the glass tubes with plastic caps to prevent water evaporation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f4b19","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":426532,"mol_weight":0,"name":"PYREX Glass Rimless Test Tube 12x75mm","linfor":"","url":"https://www.sciencecompany.com/PYREX-Glass-Rimless-Test-Tube-12x75mm-P6290.aspx","sku":"NC-0993","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"3E782E70DD4C11EDB96CFB1BB087B26A","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":1014,"name":"The Science Company®","link":"https://www.sciencecompany.com/Default.aspx","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr38l","text":"Place glass tubes on racks and incubate in a growth chamber at  ,  light/  dark until hairy roots emerge, 10-12 days post-infection (dpi). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"68ugq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"et4jl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kjp6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DCA3FD80DCCB11ED80A21D6E1BD99D9D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"28","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"E5690410DCCB11ED80A21D6E1BD99D9D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":28800,"guid":"06BF8FD0DCCC11ED80A21D6E1BD99D9D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"963k5","text":"When the first pair of leaves reaches the plastic caps (3-5 dpi), remove the caps, and seal the tube hole with parafilm or adhesive plastic (image). During this period, make sure that the level of water and B \u0026 D medium contained within the glass tubes and plastics tubes, respectively, is adequate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61g31","text":"Once the hairy roots have emerged, remove the primary root by cutting the stem 1-2 cm below the hairy roots. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bma0","text":"Transfer the seedlings to autoclaved glass tubes containing sterile B \u0026 D medium and seal the tube hole with parafilm or adhesive plastic. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lfhi","text":" ","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g59u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"n3bv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s5cd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cfd93","text":"Make sure the level of the B \u0026 D medium is below the hairy root calluses, as covering hairy root calli with B \u0026 D medium may retard their growth.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"690u6","text":"  ","type":"align-center"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ersni","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"07DA12C0E79C11EDBCF913E112AB8AB3","height":773.9635827081853,"id":367788,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":"step-9B366F90D43311EDA6F2F745DC767CB4-nested-draft-6g59u","original_name":"Calluses.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfqbwhff.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfnbwhff.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfpbwhff.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mhfmbwhff.webp","width":380.4110549504038},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"image"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7arh","text":"Incubate the seedlings for approximately three days under the same conditions described above to increase the biomass of hairy roots.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kl7h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5f6vh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1supn","text":"Observe the fully developed hairy roots (15 to 16 dpi) using an epifluorescence microscope to remove non-fluorescent roots. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bj0j9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"df53h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dmu8c","text":"Hairy roots must carry a plasmid containing a fluorescent reporter gene e.g., GFP, RFP, or YFP. Commonly, plasmids for RNAi-based gene silencing or gene overexpression carry a fluorescent reporter gene.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1a933","text":"Collect the fluorescent hairy roots carrying the RNAi-silencing or the overexpression vector, and the control vector, at the selected sampling time. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35brn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eq6mj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ct978","text":"If the amount of fluorescent hairy roots collected from a single plant is not enough tissue for RNA extraction, hairy roots from more than one plant will be needed.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b874v","text":"Extract total RNA from hairy roots using an appropriate protocol and perform cDNA synthesis. We recommend using the following protocol dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.8epv5jq24l1b/v1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":135,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":135,"length":48}],"data":{}},{"key":"bfim8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uo11","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0186F584DC6511EDBE2A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.8epv5jq24l1b/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfsqn","text":"Quantify transcript levels of the gene of interest by qPCR using two reference genes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sgoi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7n5a3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":68,"style":"italic"},{"length":13,"offset":186,"style":"italic"}],"key":"2e3li","text":"We recommend as reference genes those encoding elongator factor 1α (EF1α, Phvul.004G075100.1) and β-tubulin (Phvul.009G017300.1). For RNAi silencing-based studies, we recommend choosing A. rhizogenes clones with a silencing efficiency of at least 70%.  ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
